array.remedy: drink warm lemon water or chew fennel seeds
array.additional_info:
These infections may also cause changes in digestion, such as diarrhoea or constipation.
					  Cramps associated with menstruation are also a potential source of lower abdominal pain, but more commonly these are known to cause pelvic pain.

array.remedy: have a cup of chamomile tea
array.additional_info: try to relax and do light exercise
do not slump over your desk , sit and walk with a straight posture and be active

array.remedy: gently massage eyes with coldpack or use cucumber slices

array.additional_info: do not slump over your desk , sit and walk with a straight posture and be active
